definition: to warn/to admonish/variant of 針|针[zhen1]

sentences.english: As a thorn goeth up into the hand of a drunkard, so is a parable in the mouth of fools.
sentences.chinese: 箴言在愚昧人的口中，好像荊棘刺入醉漢的手。

sentences.english: We start a new sermon series on the Book of Proverbs from today.
sentences.chinese: 我們從今天開始箴言的系列證道。

sentences.english: The first teaching of wisdom at the beginning of Proverbs is not to be greedy of gain.
sentences.chinese: 箴言開頭所講智慧的第一樣訓誨就是不可貪戀財利。

sentences.english: Words that probably ring true for every Harry Potter fan.
sentences.chinese: 對每一位哈利波特的影迷來說，這或許是句箴言。

sentences.english: As a lame man hath fair legs in vain: so a parable is unseemly in the mouth of fools.
sentences.chinese: 猶如跛子的腳虛懸無力，箴言在愚人口中也是如此。

sentences.english: The Christian Science Monitor was founded in 1908.

sentences.chinese: 聖經箴言16:18裏寫道“驕兵必敗”。

sentences.english: It constantly outdistances us. "Relish the moment" is a good motto.
sentences.chinese: “享受現在”這句箴言頗有道理。

sentences.english: He also includes some wise advice about life in his evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 同時，他的評價中也包括了一些充滿智慧的箴言。

sentences.english: The parables of Solomon, the son of David, king of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 以色列王達味之子撒羅滿的箴言。

sentences.english: On the walls of this venerable shrine is written the precepts of the seven sages.
sentences.chinese: 在這座神聖的寺廟的牆壁上寫着七位聖賢的箴言。

sentences.english: That's the intensity behind the action words in our proverb today.
sentences.chinese: 今天箴言中的動詞也包含著同樣的迫切感。

sentences.english: And there is the same amount of contradiction in maxims as in proverbs.
sentences.chinese: 格言中自相矛盾的地方跟箴言一樣多。

sentences.english: "Set me free(Let me go), please. "asked the bird, "I can teach you three wisdom mottoes.
sentences.chinese: “把我放了吧，”鳥說，“我可以教你三句智慧箴言。

sentences.english: The storehouse of wisdom is stocked with proverbull crap.
sentences.chinese: 智慧的倉庫裏儲滿箴言。

definition: to warn/to admonish/variant of 針|针[zhen1]
Epistle of St James (in New Testament)
a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
Second epistle of St Paul to Timothy
